DataElement.preferredName: Medical Condition Performed Observation Outcome Report Date and Time PCORnet CDM Medical Condition Result Report Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Relating to the study or practice of medicine.:A state of being, such as a state of health.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._A short textual account; having provided a short account.:An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen._Date condition was noted, which may be the date when it was recorded by a provider or nurse, or the date on which the patient reported it.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredName: PCORnet CDM Medical Condition Result Report Date
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Date condition was noted, which may be the date when it was recorded by a provider or nurse, or the date on which the patient reported it.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
